name: Robo Rumble (itch)
description:
In the distant future, humanity created worker robots to help them with everyday tasks...

Those robots eventually went rogue, and were dealt with by humanity swiftly, banishing all of them to a single scrapyard to fester and waste away...

One of these robots, however, is unique; it still possesses an intact CPU, and wishes to escape and live out its days outside of a tech graveyard...
